extension.name: True WYSIWYG TinyMCE
extension.author: Dimitris Grammatikogiannis
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later;
extension.description: A simple plugin that adds true WYSIWYG capabilities to TinyMCE. Requires: a modern template (support for child template), a file named jeditor.php in the template and files style_formats.json and formats.json in the template's html folder.
